text: The Venezuela national under-17 football team represents Venezuela in the under-17 international football team. They have attended the FIFA U-17 World Cup twice in their history with their best placing coming at the 2023 FIFA U-17 World Cup where they finished in the round of 16. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA
